alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 3:20PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally heavier amounts in higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...South Central Utah, Zion National Park and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected across the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Zion National Park
